A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and session management for contest participation
Contest browsing interface displaying available knowledge competitions
Contest enrollment functionality allowing users to join competitions
Interactive question display interface showing one question at a time
Answer submission system for users to provide responses to contest questions
Real-time scoring mechanism calculating user performance
Personal score dashboard displaying individual user results and rankings
Public leaderboard showcasing top performers in each contest
Performance comparison feature allowing users to view how they rank against others
Responsive UI design with beige as the base color and saddle brown for all components
Package.json configured with 'install:all' script to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with 'dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
Database schema supporting users, contests, questions, answers, and leaderboard data
